outputs.output_descr: Improved\ the capacity of devolved authorities and decentralised government administration to deliver public goods and services. Improve the capacity of CSOs/CBOs to: act as accountable and transparent service providers complementing government functions; and CSOs to represent public needs and monitor service delivery. Overall outcome of the project is Improved performance of regional & local level structures in delivering services in a transparent and accountable manner.

project_descr: Improved capacity of devolved authorities and decentralised government administration to deliver public goods and services in a transparent and accountable manner.
